Room rate is based on 2 adults only. Room can accommodate up to 3 adults and 1 child under 12 years.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_text.important_information:
Please present the same credit card used to guarantee your booking when checking in / making payment at the hotel. 

If you are making payment using another cardholder's credit card, kindly provide the following to the hotel prior to your arrival: 
1) Authorization letter with cardholder's signature 
2) Copy of the cardholder's card (front and back of card with cardholder's signature) 
Please note that hotel may contact the cardholder for verification purposes. 

According to the requirements under Vietnamese law, clients must present their Identification Papers/ Passport and Birth Certificate (for children) of each passenger in the group at check-in. 

In the absence of birth certificates for children, Guests and Tour Operator agree that children’s ages will be converted from their heights, specifically: 
For child under 3.3 foot tall, his/her converted age is under 4 years 
For child under 4.6 foot tall, his/her converted age is between 4 and 12 years 
For taller child, his/her converted age is above 12 years

Guests are responsible for checking the room furnishing and facilities, foods or drinks in mini-bar upon check-in and check-out as per regulations of the resort.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 6:00 PM on the day of arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel after 6:00 PM on the day of arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 4 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 4 to 12 year are charged  VND 380000 per night when using existing beds.
One child under 12 years is charged VND 570000  per night in an extra bed.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1210000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation after 6:00 PM on the day of arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
